snippet.title: Panta Rhei | Playtesting Trailer | July 2023 | reignite games
snippet.description:
Panta Rhei is a single-player adventure rogue-lite where you wield time itself as your weapon. Become the Guardian of Past and use your time-bending abilities to defeat deviant creatures in tight melee combat while exploring the mythical Realm of Time.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1730550/Panta_Rhei/
